textCompanyOverview1: PT KB Data Systems Indonesia, a subsidiary of KB Data Systems, is a Southeast Asian-based financial IT specialized company established to expand the business base/advance of Southeast Asian-focused affiliates and to provide global common IT services.
textCompanyOverview2: KB Data Systems established PT KB Data Systems Indonesia, an Indonesian IT local corporation, to serve as a bridge in the global expansion of affiliates in connection with KB Financial Group's 'New Southern' strategy. As a result, we aim to secure a foundation for entry into global financial IT and provide a global IT shared service by upgrading the local system.
textCompanyOverview3: In Indonesia, the pinnacle of the financial group’s “2nd Mother Market strategy,” KB Data System, which has accumulated Korea’s Latest financial IT technology, and overseas subsidiaries that will play a pivotal role in the advancement of Indonesia's financial IT system by contributing to the promotion and dissemination of advanced financial technology capabilities.
visionText1: Driven by world-class talents and bold innovation, to become your trusted financial partner for a lifetime
missionText1: Financial services delivering changes — happier life & better world
textBusinessDomain1: Carrying out various projects for financial IT Innovation

cards.title: Customer Focus
cards.text1: Making judgments and making decisions considering the customer's position and interests as the top priority

cards.title: Professionalism
cards.text1: We are constantly striving to become a financial person with the highest level of competency in the industry.

cards.title: Innovation
cards.text1: Leading change and innovation through creative thinking and bold challenges as the ‘First Mover’ of future finance

cards.title: Trust
cards.text1: Always maintain an attitude of honesty and good faith based on ethical awareness

cards.title: Shared Growth
cards.text1: Beyond the development of individuals and organizations, we grow together with the people and contribute to the development of society

textCompanyOverview1: PT KB Data Systems Indonesia merupakan anak perusahaan dari KB Data Systems yang berbasis di Asia Tenggara yang didirikan untuk memperluas jangkauan bisnis dengan kompetensi teknologi digital  dan menjadi mitra teknologi finansial secara global
textCompanyOverview2: KB Data Systems mendirikan PT KB Data Systems Indonesia, sebuah perusahaan berbasis teknologi informasi di Indonesia, untuk menjadi jembatan dalam ekspansi global dan berafiliasi sehubungan dengan strategi 'New Southern' KB Financial Group. Sehingga, kami bertujuan untuk memperkokoh fundamental untuk memasuki era teknologi informasi yang terkait dengan finansial secara global dan menyediakan layanan untuk meningkatkan sistem.
textCompanyOverview3: KB Data System memutuskan untuk melakukan investasi tambahan dengan menetapkan Indonesia sebagai 'Pasar Induk Kedua' dan telah berinovasi dengan mengumpulkan teknologi terbaru didorong oleh kompetensi teknologi digital untuk memajukan sistem teknologi finansial di Indonesia dengan berkontribusi pada promosi dan menyebarkan informasi tentang kemampuan teknologi finansial yang mutakhir
visionText1: Menjadi mitra inovasi teknologi finansial paling tepercaya dengan potensi terbaik dan inovasi hebat untuk menjadi perusahaan keuangan yang mengubah dunia
missionText1: Menciptakan kebahagiaan bagi pelanggan keuangan dan menciptakan kehidupan dan dunia yang lebih baik
textBusinessDomain1: Melaksanakan berbagai proyek untuk inovasi finansial dengan teknologi digital

cards.title: Fokus Pelanggan
cards.text1: Membuat penilaian dan pengambilan keputusan dengan mempertimbangkan posisi dan kepentingan pelanggan sebagai prioritas utama

cards.title: Profesionalisme
cards.text1: Kami terus berusaha untuk menjadi mitra finansial dengan tingkat kompetensi tertinggi di bidangnya.

cards.title: Inovasi
cards.text1: Memimpin perubahan dan inovasi melalui pemikiran kreatif dan berani mengambil tantangan sebagai 'Penggerak Pertama' keuangan masa depan

cards.title: Kepercayaan
cards.text1: Selalu mempertahankan sikap kejujuran dan kesetiaan berdasarkan etika.

cards.title: Tumbuh Bersama
cards.text1: Di luar pengembangan individu dan organisasi, kami tumbuh bersama dengan masyarakat dan berkontribusi pada pengembangan masyarakat

textCompanyOverview1: PT KB데이타시스템즈 인도네시아는 KB데이타시스템즈의 자회사로 동남아계 계열사의 사업기반/선진화 및 글로벌 공통 IT 서비스 제공을 위해 설립된 동남아 기반 금융IT 전문기업입니다.
textCompanyOverview2: KB데이타시스템즈는 KB금융그룹의 '신남방' 전략과 연계해 계열사 글로벌 확장의 가교 역할을 하기 위해 인도네시아 IT 현지법인인 PT KB데이타시스템즈 인도네시아를 설립했다. 이를 통해 글로벌 금융IT 진출 기반을 확보하고 현지 시스템 고도화를 통해 글로벌 IT 공유 서비스를 제공하고자 합니다.
textCompanyOverview3: 금융그룹 '제2의 마더마켓' 전략의 정점인 인도네시아에서 한국의 최신 금융IT 기술을 축적한 KB데이터시스템과 해외법인이 선진 금융 기술 역량을 홍보하고 보급합니다.
visionText1: 세상을 바꾸는 금융 고객의 행복, 우리는 더 나은 세상을 만듭니다
missionText1: 최고의 인재와 과감한 혁신으로 신뢰받는 금융IT파트너
textBusinessDomain1: 금융IT 혁신을 위한 다양한 프로젝트를 수행하고 있습니다

cards.title: 고객 중심
cards.text1: 고객의 입장과 이익을 최우선으로 판단하고 의사결정

cards.title: 전문 직업 의식
cards.text1: 목표를 향해 끊임없이 노력하는 업계 최고 수준의 금융 전문가

cards.title: 혁신 주도
cards.text1: 창의적 사고와 과감한 도전으로 변화와 혁신을 선도하는 미래금융의 'First Mover'

cards.title: 정직을 믿으십시오
cards.text1: 정직과 윤리는 항상 선의의 태도를 유지

cards.title: 동반성장
cards.text1: 개인과 조직의 발전을 넘어 함께 성장하고 사회발전에 기여
